channel.title: CVE Feed for Hitachi Vantara -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Hitachi Vantara -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-1158|2024-08-02T05:40:57.915Z -- hitachi%20vantara -- pentaho%20business%20analytics%20server
item.description: Hitachi Vantara Pentaho Business Analytics Server versions before 9.4.0.1 and 9.3.0.3, including 8.3.x expose dashboard prompts to users who are not part of the authorization list.

item.title: CVE-2023-2358|2024-08-02T06:19:14.897Z -- hitachi%20vantara -- pentaho%20business%20analytics%20server
item.description: Hitachi Vantara Pentaho Business Analytics Server prior to versions 9.5.0.0 and 9.3.0.4, including 8.3.x.x, saves passwords of the Hadoop Copy Files step in plaintext.

item.title: CVE-2023-6538|2024-08-02T08:35:13.612Z -- hitachi%20vantara -- system%20management%20unit%20%28smu%29
item.description: SMU versions prior to 14.8.7825.01 are susceptible to unintended information disclosure, through URL manipulation. Authenticated users in Storage, Server or combined Server+Storage administrative roles are able to access SMU configuration backup, that would normally be barred to those specific administrative roles.

item.title: CVE-2023-5808|2024-08-02T08:14:23.995Z -- hitachi%20vantara -- system%20management%20unit%20%28smu%29
item.description: SMU versions prior to 14.8.7825.01 are susceptible to unintended information disclosure, through URL manipulation. Authenticated users in a Storage administrative role are able to access HNAS configuration backup and diagnostic data, that would normally be barred to that specific administrative role.

item.title: CVE-2023-3517|2024-08-02T06:55:03.685Z -- hitachi%20vantara -- pentaho%20data%20integration%20%26%20analytics
item.description: Hitachi Vantara Pentaho Data Integration & Analytics versions before 9.5.0.1 and 9.3.0.5, including 8.3.x does not restrict JNDI identifiers during the creation of XActions, allowing control of system level data sources.

item.title: CVE-2024-28982|2024-07-09T19:15:50.518Z -- hitachi%20vantara -- pentaho%20business%20analytics%20server
item.description: Hitachi Vantara Pentaho Business Analytics Server versions before 10.1.0.0 and 9.3.0.7, including 8.3.x do not correctly protect the ACL service endpoint of the Pentaho User Console against XML External Entity Reference.

item.title: CVE-2024-28983|2024-06-27T14:48:13.210Z -- hitachi%20vantara -- pentaho%20business%20analytics%20server
item.description: Hitachi Vantara Pentaho Business Analytics Server prior to versions 10.1.0.0 and 9.3.0.7, including 8.3.x allow a malicious URL to inject content into the Analyzer plugin interface.

item.title: CVE-2023-5617|2024-02-28T22:30:40.128Z -- hitachi%20vantara -- pentaho%20data%20integration%20%26%20analytics
item.description: Hitachi Vantara Pentaho Data Integration & Analytics versions before 10.1.0.0 and 9.3.0.6, including 9.5.x and 8.3.x, display the version of Tomcat when a server error is encountered.

item.title: CVE-2024-28982|2024-06-26T22:37:01.285Z -- hitachi%20vantara -- pentaho%20business%20analytics%20server
item.description: Hitachi Vantara Pentaho Business Analytics Server versions before 10.1.0.0 and 9.3.0.7, including 8.3.x do not correctly protect the ACL service endpoint of the Pentaho User Console against XML External Entity Reference.

item.title: CVE-2024-28984|2024-06-26T22:41:57.450Z -- hitachi%20vantara -- pentaho%20business%20analytics%20server
item.description: Hitachi Vantara Pentaho Business Analytics Server prior to versions 10.1.0.0 and 9.3.0.7, including 8.3.x allow a malicious URL to inject content into the Analyzer plugin interface.
